segments.text: I notice the boy reaching for the cookie jar, barely balancing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s going to fall any second now, and the woman won’t even see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for her share, completely trusting him not to drop her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at their teamwork, even if it’s mischievous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is already tilting backward, and he doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman ever notices when they sneak cookies like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is getting closer to them, making the floor even more dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they grab what they want and get down before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in so much light, but it’s like no one sees the real problem here.
segments.speaker: PAR
